mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET is_read = 1 WHERE accept_user_id = #{userId} AND del_flag = 0
UPDATE comment SET is_read = 1 WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND accept_user_id = #{userId} AND del_flag = 0
mapper.select: SELECT id, post_id, comment_content, comment_parent, user_id, path_trace, accept_user_id, like_count, dislike_count, create_time, is_read FROM comment WHERE del_flag = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment WHERE user_id = #{value} AND del_flag = 0
DELETE FROM comment WHERE accept_user_id = #{value} AND del_flag = 0
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM comment WHERE path_trace LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pathTrace},'%') AND del_flag = 0
